feed.title: Masq
feed.subtitle: Spencer Walden's information security (infosec) blog. He primarily blogs about network security, malware analysis, python, and cyber threat intelligence. He might also discuss detection engineering and threat hunting.

entry.title: Challenging the Cyber Kill Chain
entry.summary: Within Cyber Threat Intelligence, there are a few prevalent models for categorizing/analyzing intrusions. These are the Diamond Model, MITRE ATT&CK, and of course, the Lockheed Martin Cyber Threat Kill Chain. While these models are extremely helpful, I take some umbrage with the lattermost model—the kill chain. What is the Kill Chain? In a quick summary, the kill chain is 7 steps—or, 7 li...
